item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a writer, editor, translator, and teacher. Research Interest I am interested in the intersection of politics, aesthetics, and technology. In my writing and my advocacy I explore ways of reverse engineering infrastructure and media at a time of cultural decline. Publications The New Wave of Digital Collections, The American Philosophical Society Immersive Pedagogy, The Journal of Interactive Technology and Pedagogy
